title: How to Draw a Bow and Arrow

steps.headline: Draw the body of the bow.
steps.description: Make a curve that bends upwards on the tip; it should look something like a handle. Then add two rectangles on top of the peak of the curve. This will make the grip of the bow.

steps.headline: Draw a straight line from one tip of the bow to the other.
steps.description: Add a very slim rectangle next to it--this will be the body of the arrow.

steps.headline: Draw six rectangle shapes for the feathers like this.
steps.description: They should all be concentrated at one end, with three on each side.

steps.headline: Draw a pointy triangle for the tip of the arrow that does not have feathers.
steps.description: Make it isosceles and relatively thin, pointing downward as seen.

steps.headline: Paint your image.
steps.description: Use a color you like for the bow.You can make the grip of a different color. Remember the tip of the arrow should look like metal, so use silver or grey.
